changeSet.author: Sunil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Product` (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , name VARCHAR (200), cost FLOAT(10,2));

changeSet.author: Sunil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Customer` (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , firstName VARCHAR (200), lastName varchar(200), street varchar(200), state varchar(2),zip int(5), country varchar(200));

changeSet.author: Sunil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Order` (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , customer_id int ,Status ENUM('PLACED', 'FULFILLED', 'CANCELED') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'PLACED', total float(10,2), createDate DATETIME, updateDate DATETIME);

changeSet.author: Sunil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `LineItem` (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,order_id int , product_id int,quantity VARCHAR (200));

changeSet.author: Sunil
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `LineItem` ADD FOREIGN KEY(product_id) REFERENCES `Product` (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE;

changeSet.author: Sunil
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `LineItem` ADD FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES `Order` (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE;

changeSet.author: Sunil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Ping` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `data` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
